posts.postText:
Name: Tderrow95
SteamID: Steam_0:0:39346971
Admins on: None
Reason: First 2 rounds he showed up he shot and tried to rdm traitors right after they bought items. First one was ninjakirby who bought a jihad before he tried to rdm, and second time was Udane who bought a radar before he tried to rdm them. We started a vote kick but left immediately after it was started.

A picture of the DMG logs are in my steam page: http://steamcommunity.com/id/hidden_assassin/screenshot/576668995810974666

I also crowbarred Udane to make sure my suspicion of him traitor scripting was true. I did apologize and explain that to Udane at the time. (Less then 20 hp wouldn't let him do much as traitor sadly)

damn tator scripters... i hate em.

ban request accepted.
